response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations. Given its value and potential impact on your endeavors, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $14,500. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects my confidence in the product's ability to meet your needs and surpass your expectations. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your budget and interests, so we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 14500}
